>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.On2ZrPJTe8FURsXY]{Operative Exploit}

After you finish moving as part of a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.MBNI94tbMoqizPUk]{trick attack} (and before attempting your attack, if you haven’t done so already), you can perform a quick, intimidating display that makes any foe adjacent to you @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.nywSVEeDvp1bk7L3]{shaken} until the beginning of your next turn (Will negates). This shaken condition is suppressed for a creature whenever it is no longer adjacent to you. Once you use this exploit, you can’t do so again until you rest for 10 minutes to regain Stamina Points. This is a fear effect.
